title: SU2 Configuration Parameters
description: Complete JSON Schema for SU2 CFD configuration files

KIND_TURB_MODEL.description: Specify turbulence model (options from Turb_Model_Map). Default: NO_TURB_MODEL:contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

KIND_TRANS_MODEL.description: Specify transition model (options from Trans_Model_Map). Default: NO_TRANS_MODEL:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

RESTART_SOL.description: Restart solution from native solution file

SYSTEM_MEASUREMENTS.description: System of measurements (options from Measurements_Map). Default: SI:contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

VISCOSITY_MODEL.description: Model of the viscosity (options from ViscosityModel_Map). Default: SUTHERLAND:contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

REYNOLDS_NUMBER.description: Reynolds number (non-dimensional, based on the free-stream values)

MACH_NUMBER.description: Mach number (non-dimensional, based on the free-stream values)

INIT_OPTION.description: Init option for initializing solution (options from InitOption_Map). Default: REYNOLDS:contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}

FREESTREAM_DENSITY.description: Free-stream density (kg/m^3; default -1.0 means calculated from others):contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}

REF_ELEM_LENGTH.description: Reference element length for slope limiter epsilon:contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}

MARKER_CONTROL_VOLUME.description: Surface marker(s) for flow solution in control volume:contentReference[oaicite:36]{index=36}

MARKER_DESIGNING.description: Surface marker(s) where design objective is evaluated:contentReference[oaicite:37]{index=37}

ACTDISK_TYPE.description: Actuator disk boundary type (options from ActDisk_Map). Default: VARIABLES_JUMP:contentReference[oaicite:49]{index=49}

MARKER_ACTDISK.description: Periodic boundary marker(s) for actuator disk (format specific):contentReference[oaicite:50]{index=50}

INLET_TYPE.description: Inlet boundary type (options from Inlet_Map). Default: TOTAL_CONDITIONS:contentReference[oaicite:51]{index=51}

MARKER_INLET.description: Inlet boundary marker(s) with format depending on INLET_TYPE

MARKER_RIEMANN.description: Riemann boundary markers with specific format and flow direction

MIXING_PROCESS_TYPE.description: Mixing process type for boundary averaging (options from MixingProcess_Map). Default: AREA_AVERAGE:contentReference[oaicite:54]{index=54}

MARKER_MIXINGPLANE.description: Boundary marker(s) where mixing plane is applied:contentReference[oaicite:55]{index=55}

MARKER_SUPERSONIC_INLET.description: Supersonic inlet marker(s) (format: marker, T, p, u, v, w):contentReference[oaicite:56]{index=56}

MARKER_OUTLET.description: Outlet boundary marker(s) with format: (marker, back pressure, ...)

MARKER_ISOTHERMAL.description: Isothermal wall markers with format: (marker, temperature, ...)

MARKER_HEATFLUX.description: Heat flux wall markers with format: (marker, heat flux, ...)

ENGINE_INFLOW_TYPE.description: Inflow boundary type for engine (options from Engine_Inflow_Map). Default: FAN_FACE_MACH:contentReference[oaicite:62]{index=62}

LINEAR_SOLVER.description: Linear solver for implicit or mesh systems (options from Linear_Solver_Map). Default: FGMRES:contentReference[oaicite:63]{index=63}

LINEAR_SOLVER_PREC.description: Preconditioner for linear solvers (options from Linear_Solver_Prec_Map). Default: LU_SGS:contentReference[oaicite:64]{index=64}

RESIDUAL_FUNC_FLOW.description: Flow functional for residual criterion (options from Residual_Map). Default: RHO_RESIDUAL:contentReference[oaicite:68]{index=68}

CAUCHY_ELEMS.description: Number of elements for Cauchy criterion. Default: 100:contentReference[oaicite:70]{index=70}

CAUCHY_FUNC_FLOW.description: Flow functional for Cauchy criterion (options from Objective_Map). Default: DRAG_COEFFICIENT:contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72}

CAUCHY_FUNC_ADJFLOW.description: Adjoint functional for Cauchy criterion (options from Sens_Map). Default: SENS_GEOMETRY:contentReference[oaicite:73]{index=73}

START_UP_ITER.description: Startup iterations using fine grid only. Default: 0:contentReference[oaicite:74]{index=74}

MGCYCLE.description: Multigrid cycle type (options from MG_Cycle_Map). Default: V_CYCLE:contentReference[oaicite:76]{index=76}

NUM_METHOD_GRAD.description: Numerical method for spatial gradients (options from Gradient_Map). Default: WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES:contentReference[oaicite:79]{index=79}

CONV_NUM_METHOD_FLOW.description: Convective numerical method for flow (options from Upwind_Map/Centered_Map):contentReference[oaicite:83]{index=83}

HROUGHNESS.description:
KIND_SCALAR_MODEL 
 DESCRIPTION: Specify scalar transport model 
 Options: see \link Scalar_Model_Map \endlink 
 DEFAULT: NONE \ingroup Config

STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_MASSFLOW.description: RESTART_SOL \n DESCRIPTION: Restart solution from native solution file \n Options: NO, YES \ingroup Config

DATADRIVEN_NEWTON_RELAXATION.description: DATADRIVEN_INITIAL_DENSITY \n DESCRIPTION: Optional initial value for fluid density used for the Newton solver processes in the data-driven fluid model.

DATADRIVEN_INITIAL_DENSITY.description: DATADRIVEN_INITIAL_ENERGY \n DESCRIPTION: Optional initial value for fluid static energy used for the Newton solver processes in the data-driven fluid model.

THERMAL_EXPANSION_COEFF.description: MOLECULAR_WEIGHT \n DESCRIPTION: Molecular weight for an incompressible ideal gas (28.96 g/mol (air) default) \ingroup Config

CATALYTIC_EFFICIENCY.description: MARKER_MONITORING\n DESCRIPTION: Marker(s) of the surface where evaluate the non-dimensional coefficients \ingroup Config

WALLMODEL_KAPPA.description: WALLMODEL_MAXITER \n DESCRIPTION: Max iterations used for the wall model \n DEFAULT 200 \ingroup Config

WALLMODEL_RELFAC.description: WALLMODEL_MINYPLUS \n DESCRIPTION: lower limit for Y+ used for the wall model \n DEFAULT 5.0 \ingroup Config

WALLMODEL_MINYPLUS.description: WALLMODEL_B \n DESCRIPTION: constant B used for the wall model \n DEFAULT 5.5 \ingroup Config

WALLMODEL_B.description: BULK_MODULUS \n DESCRIPTION: Value of the Bulk Modulus  \n DEFAULT 1.42E5 \ingroup Config

BETA_FACTOR.description: MACH_NUMBER  \n DESCRIPTION:  Mach number (non-dimensional, based on the free-stream values). 0.0 by default \ingroup Config

INC_DENSITY_REF.description: INC_VELOCITY_REF \n DESCRIPTION: Reference velocity for incompressible flows (1.0 by default) \ingroup Config

INC_VELOCITY_REF.description: INC_TEMPERATURE_REF \n DESCRIPTION: Reference temperature for incompressible flows with the energy equation (1.0 by default) \ingroup Config

INC_TEMPERATURE_REF.description: INC_DENSITY_INIT \n DESCRIPTION: Initial density for incompressible flows (1.2886 kg/m^3 by default) \ingroup Config

INC_DENSITY_INIT.description: INC_VELOCITY_INIT \n DESCRIPTION: Initial velocity for incompressible flows (1.0,0,0 m/s by default) \ingroup Config

INC_TEMPERATURE_INIT.description: INC_NONDIM \n DESCRIPTION: Non-dimensionalization scheme for incompressible flows. \ingroup Config

INC_INLET_DAMPING.description: INC_OUTLET_DAMPING \n DESCRIPTION: Damping factor applied to the iterative updates to the pressure at a mass flow outlet in incompressible flow (0.1 by default). \ingroup Config

DIFFUSIVITY_CONSTANT.description: SCHMIDT_LAM \n DESCRIPTION: Laminar Schmidt number of mass diffusion \n DEFAULT 1.0 (~for Gases) \ingroup Config

SCHMIDT_NUMBER_LAMINAR.description: SCHMIDT_TURB \n DESCRIPTION: Turbulent Schmidt number of mass diffusion \n DEFAULT 0.70 (more or less experimental value) \ingroup Config

SCHMIDT_NUMBER_TURBULENT.description: DESCRIPTION: Constant Lewis number for mass diffusion

MARKER_PERIODIC.description: Periodic boundary markers with transformation parameters

INLET_MATCHING_TOLERANCE.description:
MARKER_INLET  \n DESCRIPTION: Inlet boundary marker(s) with the following formats,
   Total Conditions: (inlet marker, total temp, total pressure, flow_direction_x,
   flow_direction_y, flow_direction_z, ... ) where flow_direction is
   a unit vector.
   Mass Flow: (inlet marker, density, velocity magnitude, flow_direction_x,
   flow_direction_y, flow_direction_z, ... ) where flow_direction is
   a unit vector. \ingroup Config

AVERAGE_MACH_LIMIT.description: RAMP_OUTLET_PRESSURE\n DESCRIPTION: option to ramp up or down the rotating frame velocity value

FAN_POLY_EFF.description: SUBSONIC_ENGINE\n DESCRIPTION: Engine subsonic intake region \ingroup Config

DAMP_ENGINE_EXHAUST.description:
ENGINE_INFLOW_TYPE  
 DESCRIPTION: Inlet boundary type 
 OPTIONS: see \link Engine_Inflow_Map \endlink 
 Default: FAN_FACE_MACH \ingroup Config

CFL_REDUCTION_ADJTURB.description: CFL_REDUCTION_SPECIES \n DESCRIPTION: Reduction factor of the CFL coefficient in the species problem \n DEFAULT: 1.0

CONV_RESIDUAL_MINVAL.description: CONV_STARTITER\n DESCRIPTION: Iteration number to begin convergence monitoring\n DEFAULT: 5 \ingroup Config

CONV_CAUCHY_EPS.description: CONV_WINDOW_STARTITER\n DESCRIPTION: Iteration number after START_ITER_WND  to begin convergence monitoring\n DEFAULT: 15 \ingroup Config

CONV_WINDOW_CAUCHY_EPS.description: CONV_WINDOW_CAUCHY_ELEMS\n DESCRIPTION: Number of elements to apply the criteria. \n DEFAULT 100 \ingroup Config

LAX_SENSOR_COEFF.description: USE_ACCURATE_FLUX_JACOBIANS \n DESCRIPTION: Use numerically computed Jacobians for AUSM+up(2) and SLAU(2) \ingroup Config

CENTRAL_JACOBIAN_FIX_FACTOR.description: CENTRAL_JACOBIAN_FIX_FACTOR \n DESCRIPTION: Control numerical properties of the global Jacobian matrix using a multiplication factor for incompressible central schemes \ingroup Config

ADJ_LAX_SENSOR_COEFF.description: MUSCL_TURB \n DESCRIPTION: Check if the MUSCL scheme should be used \ingroup Config

LIMIT_ADJFLOW.description: MG_ADJFLOW\n DESCRIPTION: Multigrid with the adjoint problem. \n Defualt: YES \ingroup Config

REFERENCE_GEOMETRY_PENALTY.description: REFERENCE_GEOMETRY_FILENAME \n DESCRIPTION: Reference geometry filename \n Default: reference_geometry.dat \ingroup Config

REFERENCE_NODE_PENALTY.description: TOTAL_DV_PENALTY\n DESCRIPTION: Penalty weight value to maintain the total sum of DV constant \ingroup Config

TOTAL_DV_PENALTY.description: STRESS_PENALTY_PARAM\n DESCRIPTION: Maximum allowed stress and KS exponent for structural optimization \ingroup Config

MAX_TIME.description: Maximum physical time for time-accurate simulations
